name: Business Tycoon Simulator
description:
Manage your company and build a monopoly!

Do you have what it takes to be a wealth builder and a tycoon business manager?
Put your business strategy-making skills to the test in an intense, challenging real-time strategy game available online!

The trade Tycoon Business Game is a realistic company tycoon game where you raise and manage your own company. Play this fun, relaxing game for free, manage your own company, and become the world's strongest empire!

Are you ready to be the best business manager and wealth builder in the business simulation world? This business simulation entrepreneur game is designed to give you realistic tycoon game challenges that you must complete to scale your business and grow.

Try Tycoon Business Game – Empire & Business Simulator now!

FEATURES of Tycoon Business Game – Empire & Business Simulator:
- Play and enjoy a realistic world map with other players’ companies, famous world sites, banks, mines, stock exchanges, and many more!
- Enjoy premium resources: Buy gold coins, and use them to purchase a variety of upgrades like money, special units, hurry productions, etc
- Trade daily in commodities like oil barrels. Buy concessions and unlock new financial markets
- Buy business and transportation lines and trade resources
- Buy investments like a soccer team and utilize them on the world map
- Research new products, improve your company’s capabilities and growth
- Use real-time strategy to acquire resources and become a trade tycoon
- Participate in business challenges with real-world scenarios such as taking a loan from the bank, the viability of manufacturing products, etc.
- Recruit an army that will defend your assets and attack your rivals!
- Invest in startup companies in various fields from high-tech to Cyber and health
- Trade stocks and perform daily trades at the NYSE stock market in New York
- Build Mega-Projects like constructing nuclear plants, an underground hotel, etc, and sell them to countries worldwide
- Participate in your country's National Congress and vote on strategic moves. Members of Congress can also start a war on another country and then actively participate by attacking the opponent and donating money to their country
- New in Tycoon Business Game: No more waiting! No more action bar. As long as you have the money, you can continue evolving!

POLISH YOUR BUSINESS MANAGEMENT SKILLS
Come up with a business strategy to trade resources like mine, gold, and gems. Buy businesses, transportation, natural resources, manage concessions, make investments, research new technology, trade in the stock market, and many more in one of the best real-time strategy business tycoon games.


REALTIME STRATEGY GAME
Visit world sites and perform various actions like mining for natural resources, arranging tourist guides, experimenting with new technologies, making more money and profit in business, and outperforming rival tycoons. Compete against other players and choose whether to join forces in an alliance or become rivals.

COME UP WITH THE BEST BUSINESS STRATEGY
As financial companies become stronger, richer, and more powerful, you get to train army units to defend your assets and money at later stages of the game.

BECOME A TRADING TYCOON
Take your business skills to the max in one of the best business simulation tycoon games. The company and business manager are competing to become the richest and strongest tycoon and wealth builder globally.



Start as a small entrepreneur and build your way to be the world's strongest, wealthiest business empire owner and wealth builder!
Conquer the market and become a business empire! Become the landlord manager of your company and enjoy playing this addictive time-killing game!
